text:
James "Jay" Brazeau (born December 22, 1953) is a Canadian actor. He is best known for his role as Sam Fisher in "Cold Squad", as Harlan in "Stargate SG-1" (1997-2007), for voicing Uncle Quigley in ' and as Bobby in "Double Jeopardy" (1999).
In May 2011, Brazeau suffered a minor stroke while changing costumes backstage 30 minutes into a preview performance.
